actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Education, Arts, Humanities.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from the Department of Education and Office of Management and Budget.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Education, Arts and Humanities

official_title: A bill to provide financial assistance to raise the literacy skills of commercial drivers.

summary.text: Amends the Adult Education Act to authorize the Secretary of Education to make grants to pay one-half of the costs of adult education programs to increase commercial drivers' literacy skills so they may pass the knowledge test requirements for licensing under the Commercial Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1986. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1990 and 1991.

titles.title: A bill to provide financial assistance to raise the literacy skills of commercial drivers.
